basics.name: Jaime A. Olmo Hernández
basics.label: Programmer & Computer Scientist
basics.summary: After 10 years successfully serving the pharmaceutical industry I will like to contribute all this experience to what really I am passionate about, the development of software. I want to be part of a team who really love best coding practices.

work.summary: Successfully proven in the following areas, System and Database Administration, Maintaining In-house developed applications and Project Management. With my knowledge in SQL and Computer Programming I integrated Heterogeneous Systems into simple business solutions.
highlights: Administrate a Data Historian System of 100K items.
Coordinate Control Systems and Historian Systems upgrades with minimum downtime to the manufacturing process.
Acquire and analyze raw data using SQL to support process investigations.
Modify ASP.NET applications on C# and VB.NET to complies with new production requirements.
Modify legacy code, VB6 to  to complies with new production requirements.
Administer and optimize Web Applications code through refactoring. Those applications were used by approximately 300 users to generate reports and trends of manufacturing process data.
Train and provide support to personnel from different areas in order to maximize the knowledge gathered from automated tools.

work.summary: Design critical applications for the Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (API) and Stability areas using .NET, iFix 3.5. Build and code modules to extract data from DeltaV, PROVOX and others automation systems. Validate computers systems and software using the strictest standards of the company and Pharmaceutical Industry.
highlights: Worked on multiple project of batch and continuous process control programming.
Configure, optimize and administrate different Microsoft SQL Servers.
Translate code from VB6 to VB.NET.
Design, code and debug web applications using ASP.NET and Crystal Reports.
Create an application to automate the creation of batch recipies.

work.summary: Design webpages and web application using open source tools and packages.
highlights: Design according to the standards of the W3C.
System were build mostly using PHP, MySQL, HTML and CSS.

volunteer.summary: The focus of this organization is to create awareness of the moral and cultural values in children of Madrid.
highlights: Design all the press and multimedia campaign: 'Echale la mano a un niño'.

volunteer.summary: Radio Alianza is a radio station broadcasting a Religious format in the south area of Spain.
highlights: Led the migration and automatization of the old software that manages the programming of the radio station.
President of the Computer Science Students’ Association

Highlights: President of the Computer Science Students’ Association

publications.name: Personal blog
publications.summary: Personal publishing to stay up to date on topics about software and web designs patterns and practices.
